purpose: The email is a call for applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor positions in the Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon. The university is seeking candidates with expertise in various areas of computer science, including Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering, among others. Exceptional candidates in other areas will also be considered, and applications for tenured-level positions are welcome. The selection process will focus on research ability and how candidates' expertise complements the department's strengths. Interested candidates are invited to submit their CV, cover letter, and sample publications by May 29, 2025, for initial consideration.
